metadata.title: CVE-2023-4580 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
Push notifications stored on disk in private browsing mode were not beingencrypted potentially allowing the leak of sensitive information. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 117, Firefox ESR < 115.2, and Thunderbird <115.2.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-4580` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

thunderbird - 1:115.2.0+build1-0ubuntu1
thunderbird-gnome-support - 1:115.2.0+build1-0ubuntu1
thunderbird-mozsymbols - 1:115.2.0+build1-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-calendar-timezones - 1:115.2.0+build1-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-gdata-provider - 1:115.2.0+build1-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-lightning - 1:115.2.0+build1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:115.2.0+build1-0ubuntu1').
mozjs102 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
